name: The Step The Freestyle Step, Red, Circuit Size
categoryPath: Sports & Outdoors/Exercise & Fitness/Exercise & Fitness Accessories/Balance & Step Platforms

reviews.name: The Step The Freestyle Step, Red, Circuit Size
reviews.reviewText: This is a great stepper to use at home. Being a red fanatic, I searched all over for a red stepper. When I found this one, I immediately purchased it. I was pleasantly surprised that it arrived much earlier than expected. The product came with two dvd workouts. The first disc is good for beginners to get in the habits of the movements. The second disc definitely gets your blood pumping. I feel fantastic after each set. It's easy and compact to store anywhere. I am very pleased with my purchase.
reviews.title: Great product

reviews.name: The Step The Freestyle Step, Red, Circuit Size
reviews.reviewText: in just love it, i groove to my own music. it so fun children love it as well.
reviews.title: this is a great produce for a beginner,

reviews.name: The Step The Freestyle Step, Red, Circuit Size
reviews.reviewText: This item is very sturdy, the cd that comes with it is really good as i bought it in order to help me loose weight without buying the expensive stuff or taking too much space and that is exactly what it does. plus even though they said that it would take it about 2 weeks to be delivered, it was delivered just 2 days after placing the order.
reviews.title: prompt delivery

reviews.name: The Step The Freestyle Step, Red, Circuit Size
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this step because I did not own a step that inclines. I truly enjoy the step. I can power through my workout without worrying if my step is strong enough to withstand my workout routine.
reviews.title: Able to withstand!

reviews.name: The Step The Freestyle Step, Red, Circuit Size
reviews.title: very good
